n_estimators.description: Number of trees in the forest.

criterion.description: Function to measure the quality of a split.

min_samples_split.description: Minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

min_samples_leaf.description: Minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

min_weight_fraction_leaf.description: Minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights (of all the input samples) required to be at a leaf node.

max_features.description: Number of features to consider when looking for the best split.

random_state.description: Seed of the random number generator.

max_leaf_nodes.description: Grow trees with max_leaf_nodes in best-first fashion.

min_impurity_decrease.description: A node will be split if this split induces a decrease of the impurity greater than or equal to this value.

ccp_alpha.description: Complexity parameter used for Minimal Cost-Complexity Pruning.

bootstrap.description: Whether bootstrap samples are used when building trees.

oob_score.description: Whether to use out-of-bag samples to estimate the generalization score.

n_jobs.description: Number of jobs to run in parallel for both fit and predict.

verbose.description: Controls the verbosity when fitting and predicting.

warm_start.description: When set to True, reuse the solution of the previous call to fit and add more estimators to the ensemble.

max_samples.description: The number of samples to draw from X to train each base estimator.

criterion.description: Function to measure the quality of a split.

splitter.description: The strategy used to choose the split at each node.

min_samples_split.description: Minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

min_samples_leaf.description: Minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

min_weight_fraction_leaf.description: Minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights (of all the input samples) required to be at a leaf node.

max_features.description: Number of features to consider when looking for the best split.

random_state.description: Seed of the random number generator.

max_leaf_nodes.description: Grow trees with max_leaf_nodes in best-first fashion.

min_impurity_decrease.description: A node will be split if this split induces a decrease of the impurity greater than or equal to this value.

class_weight.description: Weights associated with classes in the form {class_label: weight}.

ccp_alpha.description: Complexity parameter used for Minimal Cost-Complexity Pruning.

kernel.description: Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm.

degree.description: Degree of the polynomial kernel function.

shrinking.description: Whether to use the shrinking heuristic.

class_weight.description: Weights associated with classes in the form {class_label: weight}.

max_iter.description: Hard limit on iterations within solver.

decision_function_shape.description: Whether to return one-vs-rest ('ovr') or one-vs-one ('ovo') decision function.

break_ties.description: Whether to break ties in decision_function output.
